type StringFormat = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface ICloneable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 封裝文字配置資訊 (例如對齊、方向和定位停駐點)、顯示管理 (例如省略符號插入和國家數字取代) 和 OpenType 功能。

span.span: Encapsulates text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 設定定位停駐點的。Sets the tab stops of the . - 繪製的字串和配置矩形。Draws the string and the layout rectangle. 請注意，字串會包含索引標籤。Note that the string contains tabs. 索引標籤設定指定之位移的索引標籤的文字。The tab settings of the specify the offsets of the tabbed text. - 取得使用與定位停駐點，或會檢查值。Gets the tab stops and uses or inspects the values. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在圖形化使用者介面中，快速鍵是加底線的字母的單字 （通常會結合另一個金鑰，例如 Alt 鍵） 中，您可以按鍵盤上，若要啟用這個字表示的功能。In a graphical user interface, a hot key is the underlined letter in a word (usually combined with another key, such as the Alt key) that you can press on the keyboard to activate the functionality that the word represents. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用鍵盤快速鍵設定屬性。The following code example shows how to set a keyboard shortcut using the property. 它也會示範如何使用方法。It also demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將程式碼貼入表單中，處理表單的事件，並呼叫下列方法，傳遞做為 e 。To run this example, paste the code into a form, handle the form's event and call the following method, passing e as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetDigitSubstitution (int language, System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute substitute);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetDigitSubstitution(int32 language, valuetype System.Drawing.StringDigitSubstitute substitute) cil managed
Public Sub SetDigitSubstitution (language As Integer, substitute As StringDigitSubstitute)
public: void SetDigitSubstitution(int language, System::Drawing::StringDigitSubstitute substitute);

param.name: language
param.span: 國家語言支援 (NLS) 語言識別項，識別以本地數字取代西式數字時要使用的語言。

span.span: A National Language Support (NLS) language identifier that identifies the language that will be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.

param.span: 您可以傳遞 物件的 屬性做為 NLS 語言識別項。

span.span: You can pass the property of a object as the NLS language identifier.

param.span: 例如，您可藉由傳遞字串 "ar-EG" 至 建構函式來建立 物件。

span.span: For example, suppose you create a object by passing the string "ar-EG" to a constructor.

param.span: 如果您將該 物件的 屬性連同 傳遞給 方法，則阿拉伯數字將會在顯示期間替換為西式數字。

span.span: If you pass the property of that object along with to the method, then Arabic-Indic digits will be substituted for western digits at display time.

param.name: substitute
param.span: 列舉的元素，指定如何顯示數字。

span.span: An element of the enumeration that specifies how digits are displayed.

summary.span: 指定以本地數字取代西式數字時所要使用的語言和方法。

span.span: Specifies the language and method to be used when local digits are substituted for western digits.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 集合，如，要使用的語言，以及要使用的替代方法。Sets, for the , the language to be used and the substitution method to be used. - 繪製的字串。Draws the string. - 兩個不同的語言 （阿拉伯文和泰文） 重複上述的兩個步驟。Repeats the above two steps for two different languages (Arabic and Thai). 兩種語言的每個示範國家的替代方法以及傳統的替代方法。The National substitution method and Traditional substitution method are demonstrated for each of the two languages. 國家的方法會顯示根據使用者的地區設定的正式當地語言的數字。The National method displays digits according to the official national language of the user's locale. 傳統的方法會顯示根據使用者的本地字體或語言，這可能是不同的正式當地語言的數字。The Traditional method displays digits according to the user's native script or language, which may be different from the official national language. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetMeasurableCharacterRanges(valuetype System.Drawing.CharacterRange[] ranges) cil managed

param.name: ranges
param.span: 結構的陣列，指定由 方法的呼叫所測量的字元範圍。

span.span: An array of structures that specifies the ranges of characters measured by a call to the method.

summary.span: 指定 結構的陣列，代表由 方法的呼叫所測量的字元範圍。

span.span: Specifies an array of structures that represent the ranges of characters measured by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不允許設定 32 個以上的字元範圍，而且會導致。Setting more than 32 character ranges is not allowed and will cause an . ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 設定的字元範圍。Sets the character ranges of the . - 測量指定的字串和配置矩形的字元範圍。Measures the character ranges for a given string and layout rectangle. - 繪製字串和配置矩形。Draws the string and layout rectangle. - 繪製區域。Paints the regions. 每個指定字元範圍所佔據區域。Each specifies an area that is occupied by a range of characters. 在區域 值會設定當所測量的字元範圍方法。The values in the regions are set when the character ranges are measured by the method. - 重複前四個步驟，但是包含每個字元範圍的測量中的尾端空白。Repeats the first four steps, but includes trailing spaces in the measurement of each character range. - 清除格式旗標的，讓每個字元範圍的測量單位中不包含尾端空白。Clears the format flags of the so that trailing spaces are not included in the measurement of each character range. - 重複前四個步驟中，但使用不同的配置矩形只是要示範配置矩形會影響所測量的字元範圍。Repeats the first four steps, but uses a different layout rectangle just to demonstrate that the layout rectangle affects the measurements of the character ranges. 字型的大小也會影響測量。The size of the font will also affect the measurement. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 設定 32 個以上的字元範圍。

span.span: More than 32 character ranges are set.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetTabStops (float firstTabOffset, float[] tabStops);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetTabStops(float32 firstTabOffset, float32[] tabStops) cil managed
Public Sub SetTabStops (firstTabOffset As Single, tabStops As Single())
public: void SetTabStops(float firstTabOffset, cli::array <float> ^ tabStops);

param.name: firstTabOffset
param.span: 文字行的開頭到第一個定位停駐點的空格數目。

span.span: The number of spaces between the beginning of a line of text and the first tab stop.

param.name: tabStops
param.span: 定位停駐點的間距陣列 (以 屬性所指定的單位表示)。

span.span: An array of distances between tab stops in the units specified by the property.

summary.span: 設定這個 物件的定位停駐點。

span.span: Sets tab stops for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個定位停駐點位移`tabStops`第一個以外的陣列，是相對於前一個。Each tab-stop offset in the `tabStops` array, except the first one, is relative to the previous one. 第一次的定位停駐點位移會與所指定的初始位移位置`firstTabOffset`。The first tab-stop offset is relative to the initial offset position specified by `firstTabOffset`. 例如，如果初始的位移的位置為 8，且第一個定位停駐點位移為 50，則第一個定位停駐點是位於第 58。For example, if the initial offset position is 8 and the first tab-stop offset is 50, then the first tab stop is at position 58. 如果初始的位移的位置為零，第一個定位停駐點位移是相對於位置 0，字串來源。If the initial offset position is zero, then the first tab-stop offset is relative to position 0, the string origin. ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 設定定位停駐點的。Sets the tab stops of the . - 繪製的字串和配置矩形。Draws the string and the layout rectangle. 請注意，字串會包含索引標籤。Note that the string contains tabs. 索引標籤設定指定之位移的索引標籤的文字。The tab settings of the specify the offsets of the tabbed text. - 取得使用與定位停駐點，或會檢查值。Gets the tab stops and uses or inspects the values. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 將這個 物件轉換成人們可讀取的字串。

span.span: Converts this object to a human-readable string.

returns.span: 這個 物件的字串表示。

span.span: A string representation of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有值屬性會轉換。Only the value of the property is converted. ## Examples 下列範例專為搭配 Windows Form 使用，而且需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 將轉換為字串的物件。Converts a object to a string. - 繪製的字串。Draws the string. - 變更中的某些屬性物件。Changes some properties in the object. - 繪製的字串。Draws the string. 此字串將會不同因為屬性物件已變更。The string will be different because the properties of the object have changed. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicStringFormatExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::StringTrimming Trimming { System::Drawing::StringTrimming get(); void set(System::Drawing::StringTrimming value); };
member this.Trimming : System.Drawing.StringTrimming with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 物件的 列舉。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration for this object.

value.span: 列舉，表示如何在這個 物件所繪製的文字超過配置矩形邊緣時修剪該文字。

span.span: A enumeration that indicates how text drawn with this object is trimmed when it exceeds the edges of the layout rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，以及如何使用列舉型別。The following example shows how to set the property and how to use the enumeration. 這個範例被設計來搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. 此程式碼貼入表單並呼叫`ShowStringTrimming`方法時處理表單事件，傳遞做為 e 。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowStringTrimming` method when handling the form's event, passing e as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Misc2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/VB/form1.vb#6)]
